FuncDef:
The ptp announce-drop enable command enables a PTP interface to drop Announce packets.
The undo ptp announce-drop enable command enables a PTP interface to accept Announce packets and send responses.
By default, A PTP interface accepts Announce packets and sends responses.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Two devices exchange Announce packets to determine the master/slave relationship. The master device sends Sync packets to notify the slave device of time signal parameters and uses a delay measurement mechanism to achieve time signals accuracy.
After PTP is enabled globally on a device, all interfaces on the device send and receive Announce packets. Some interfaces do not participate in time synchronization and do not need to receive Announce packets that may affect the transmission of other services. To disable these interfaces from receiving Announce packets, run the ptp announce-drop enable command.
This command applies only to 1588v2 and SMPTE-2059-2.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
